Pre-Game Insights: The Houston Rockets start the season at home against the Charlotte Hornets.
Houston finished 41-41 overall with a 27-14 record at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Rockets averaged 24.8 assists per game on 41.8 made field goals last season.
Charlotte finished 21-61 overall with a 10-31 record on the road last season.
The Hornets shot 46.0% from the field and 35.5% from 3-point range last season.
BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Rockets -7; over/under is 230.5
Others: Hornets: Cody Martin: day to day (wrist), Mark Williams: out (foot).
